thread.section_title: MirrorMate Frames Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MirrorMate Frames | mirrormate.com | 4 of 99
thread.title: Sally

author: Sally
title: Sally
text:
I have an older home. The guest bathroom has a 6 ' x 4 ' unframed mirror. I saw Mirror Mate on line and liked what I saw. I ordered the frame and it was delivered I a short period of time.
The installation directions are spot on! My son helped me due to the size of the frame. Everything went perfectly and I am VERY HAPPY with the end result. The bathroom looks updated and the frame quality is GREAT. I am going to do my small half bath next! Thanks MirroMate for this impressive product!
